mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVO_SELLER_REQUEST ( SELLER_REQ_NO, USER_NO, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_LOGO, BUSINESS_OWNER, BUSINESS_NUMBER, BUSINESS_TEL, BUSINESS_EMAIL, BUSINESS_ZIPCODE, BUSINESS_ADDRESS, BUSINESS_ADDRESS_DETAIL,REQUEST_STATUS, REQUEST_DATE ) VALUES ( SELLER_REQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{businessName}, #{businessLogo}, #{businessOwner}, #{businessNumber}, #{businessTel}, #{businessEmail}, #{businessZipcode}, #{businessAddress}, #{businessAddressDetail}, #{requestStatus}, SYSDATE )
